articles.title: India: Delhi shuts primary schools as hazardous smog worsens - BBC.com
articles.description: Air pollution in the Indian capital is more than 50 times what is considered safe by the World Health Organization.
articles.content:
All primary schools in Delhi will close due to worsening air pollution, officials have announced.
In a post on X, the Indian capital's chief minister, Atishi Marlena Singh, said classes will move on… [+2325 chars]
